name: Chocolate Mug Cake
description: A personal mug cake, made just for you! Satisfy those sweet cravings with a single-serving slice of chocolaty heaven, straight from your microwave. You won’t believe it but it’s gluten free, too. Each package of Chocolate Mud Pie Mix whips up not one, but two tempting mug cakes.
preparation:
1. In a microwavable mug, combine mix, flour, and baking powder. Whisk in egg, oil, and vanilla. Top with chocolate chips, if using.  
  2. Microwave on high, uncovered, for 1–1 1⁄2 min, or until cake is set in the center.
tips: Microwave wattages can vary. Check to see if the cake is set after at 1 minute, then add 30 seconds if needed.
